# ankra Provider



## Example Usage


```hcl
terraform {
  required_providers {
    ankra = {
      source  = "ankraio/ankra"
      version = "0.1.0"
    }
  }
}

provider "ankra" {
  ankra_token = var.ankra_token
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `ankra_token` (String) The API token for authenticating with ankra.
